messages.subject: Square foot GardeningRe: beginning gardening
messages.msgSnippet: ... Mel died a few yrs ago. Square foot Gardening was out of print a couple of yrs ago so if you can t get it you might have to try Amazon or someone like that
messages.messageBody:
Lynda wrote:
>
> From: "Lynda" <lurine@...>
>
> Rodale does publish that, it is "Square Foot Gardening" and is written by
> Mel Bartholomew. He use to (don't know if he still does) have a television
> show that he did this on. the kidlets like this book because of the
> diagrams and easy to follow steps. they also like the one about what
> plants like to grow together, "Carrots Love" something or another.
>
> Lynda

Mel died a few yrs ago.
Square foot Gardening was out of print a couple of yrs ago so if you
can't get it you might have to try Amazon or someone like that to search
out a copy for you.
I have a beat up copy floating around the house somewhere and it is a
treasure!
It was a very popular book so libraries may still have it.

Buzz
--

messages.subject: Re: Square foot GardeningRe: beginning gardening
messages.msgSnippet: I think that Rodale Press through their Organic Book Club still have the book available.  Book clubs are my biggest vice   I just got this copy within the
messages.messageBody:
I think that Rodale Press through their Organic Book Club still have the
book available. Book clubs are my biggest vice <g> I just got this copy
within the last couple of years because my old copy was "borrowed" and
seems to have found another home.

Lynda

----------
